events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our team.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering based on your experience and skills relevant to the software developer role.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to your application to help guide you through the recruitment process.
We completed an initial screening of your profile, focusing on your engineering skills and experience with programming languages such as Java and Python.
Thank you for promptly responding to our screening questions. Your enthusiasm for the software engineering role is clearly evident.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 2:00 PM UTC. The interview will focus on coding skills and system design.
